original_text: One day, the older daughter said to her sister, ‘Our father is now old. There are no men who live near here, so there is nobody to marry us. We cannot have sex like everyone on the earth wants to do.
korean_text: 큰 딸이 작은 딸에게 이르되 우리 아버지는 늙으셨고 온 세상의 도리를 따라 우리의 배필 될 사람이 이 땅에는 없으니

sentences.original_text: One day, the older daughter said to her sister
There are no men who live near here
so there is nobody to marry us
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리와 결혼할 사람이 아무도 없습니다

sentences.original_text: We cannot have sex like everyone on the earth wants to do
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 땅위의 모든 사람들이 원하듯이 성관계를 가질 수 없습니다
